page.title: ViewSimStatus
page.introduction: View Simulation Jobs opens a window that allows the user to search for VCell simulation jobs and return a table of the simulation information; the user can also find and stop simulations that are not yet completed.

operations.para:
The View Simulation Job Status window searches for simulation jobs under your username. User Options provide selection for search parameters.
Status Filter allows the user to select any combination of types of job status.
Max # of results limits the number of results returned.
Time interval selector allows the user to chooose among several time options.
Hide orphaned when selected hides simulation jobs that are no longer associated with a Model/Application.

Select Refresh to initiate a new search after changing user options. Properties and Actions provide details of a selected query result. Stop Simulation stops a selected simulation that is currently running. Use the Search bar to filter the table of simulation jobs based on Model Name. Close the window when finished.
